import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import './Streamroom.css' import Stream from './stream.png' import S1 from './p3.jpg' import S2 from './S2.jpg' import S3 from './S3.jpg' import S4 from './S4.jpg' import S5 from './S5.jpg' import S6 from './S6.jpg' function Streamroom(){ const styles={ height:'100px', width:'auto' } const [bgColour, setBgColour] = useState("white") const [fcolor,setfcolor]=useState("rgb(8, 92, 2)") const _styles={ background:`${bgColour}`, color:`${fcolor}` } function handlechange(){ setBgColour("black") setfcolor("rgb(0, 255, 0)") } function change(){ setBgColour("white") setfcolor("rgb(8, 92, 2)") } return (

It is an online movie streaming platform where u can watch movies with your family and friends

FEATURES

LOGIN SIGNUP AUTHENTICATION
GO CHAT
PERSONAL CONTROLS
REMOTE ACCESS

TECH USED

HTML | CSS | JAVASCRIPT | NODE | MONGODB | BOOTSTRAP

PROJECT LINK

); } export default Streamroom;
